title: Course on Strengthening Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies in CMS-Based Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts and job-related mathematical problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment where medical, legal, and technical professionals solve job-related math problems using CMS tools and real-time workshops.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and propose solutions for job-specific mathematical problems at least three times using collaboration tools within the CMS
Learners can perform data-driven decision-making at least five times using analytical tools (e.g., graph generators, calculators) within the CMS in mobile environments
Learners can diagnose their tool utilization patterns and develop improvement plans based on CMS learning logs
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
